name: Best Buds Forever
description:
You own a flower shop, a place where people and plants are brought together to fulfill their happily ever after. People and plants each have their own characteristics and needs. Who’s the best match? It’s your mission to find the most plantastic pairs! 

The Team behind Best Buds Forever:

Production - Sarah Lena (@sarahlena.art)

Game Design - Christiane (@kellerlache, artstation)

Writing - Theresa (itch.io, artstation)

Art - Jeanette (@hugotest, itch.io), Christiane (@kellerlache, artstation), Janna (@jannzim, @jannzim)

Animation - Kati (@SunniraArt)

Programming - Sarah  (@sery89, @polypirates)

Sound - Katharina
